Articles.Content:
With the movie Interstellar creating so much talk about black holes lately, I'm wondering what the possibilities are for making a mod that creates a black hole in the furthest outskirts of the Kerbol system. A whole new batch of science possibilities await, not to mention a whole new way to kill off Kerbals

Thoughts? Comments?
Sounds like something Kopernicus can do, but the event horizon probably won't work.
